original_text: When they had come to Caesarea and delivered the letter to the governor, they presented Paul also before him.
korean_text: 그들이 가이사랴에 들어가서 편지를 총독에게 드리고 바울을 그 앞에 세우니

sentences.original_text: When they had come to Caesarea
and delivered the letter to the governor
they presented Paul also before him.
